opennlp.uima.doccat

Class LanguageDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase

          • opennlp.uima.doccat.LanguageDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent

    public class LanguageDetector
extends org.apache.uima.analysis_component.CasAnnotator_ImplBase
    Analysis Engine which can detected the language of a text. The AE uses the OpenNLP document categorizer and a special language detection model. The outcome of the document categorizer model is written into the language field of the CAS view.
